DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping a circular disk along the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: Radius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The _Radius_ of the circular disk to be swept along the _directrix_. Denotes the outer radius, if an _InnerRadius_ is applied.

DocAttribute.Name: InnerRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: This attribute is optional, if present it defines the radius of a circular hole in the centre of the disk.

EndParam

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixDim
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _Directrix_ shall be a curve in three dimensional space.

DocWhereRule.Name: InnerRadiusSize
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If _InnerRadius_ exists then _Radius_ denoting the outer radius shall be greater than _InnerRadius_.
